1.content: So who will you begin as?
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
oh, so its Okami's feral beauty Ammy you want eh?

ok then, how will Ammy end up on obesia?

will she get there by magic? perhaps a spell from Yama?

or maybe she goes there by choice? what's your decision?
11.title: Amaterasu

choices: Krystal feeling extremely hungry all the sudden.
Krystal sees quite a few restaurants.
Krystal is curious about some of the residents' weight.
13.content:
On a solo mission, the blue vixen and Star Fox member, Krystal, travels to an unknown planet to investigate. Krystal then parks her Arwing outside of a town. She walks over to the entrance of the town. She sees a sign with the town's name.

"Obesia?" Krystal thought. "What an odd name for a town."

Weird name or not, Krystal went into the town. But she couldn't help but get this.... weird feeling. Like something was in the air. At that moment...
13.title: Krystal

131.content:
Just then, Krystal started getting this weird hungry feeling in her stomach. As if she hadn't eaten in days. Weeks even. Krystal started cringing on to her stomach.

"Ugh!!! Why... why am I so hungry all the sudden?" Krystal thought. "Food. I just need food right now."

Krystal could only think about one thing. Satisfying her hunger. She had to go to one of the restaurants in the area. She sees quite a few and decides to pick a....
131.title: Krystal feeling extremely hungry all the sudden.

choices: Krystal stopped eating and gained a bit of weight.
Krystal was still hungry and ate more as she gained more weight.
Krystal gorged on much more food as if she never eaten before.
1311.content:
Krystal spotted a restaurant thaust happen to bedishesl-you-can-eat joint. The perfect place for someone like Krystal to satisfy your belly with a variety of food with a decent price. Krystal quickly dashed into the restaurant. The restaurant was named "Bellyup". The hostess in the front counter was a lioness in a red waitress dress. She also seem to weight at over a ton.

"Welcome to Bellyup." The lion hostess said greeting the blue vixen. "How can I help you?"
"One buffet, please? I'm REALLY hungry." Krystal stated.
"Alright then." The lioness said.
"How much?" Krystal asked knowing she would have to pay.
"You must be new here. Around these parts, all food is free." The lioness said.
"Free?!?" Krystal said surprised.
"Uh huh." The lioness said nodding.

Krystal was a bit confused. Why would the food be free? Heck, why would any of the restaurant here sell food for free? But Krystal's stomach growled loud enough for her not to care.

"Table, please?" Krystal said to the lioness.
"Just go to which ever one you want and help yourself to whatever you want at the buffet." The lioness said.
"Thanks!" Krystal said.

Krystal then went to the buffet and saw all the tasty look entrees. From steaks and other meat dishes, to rich and vegetable side dishes, desserts, and more.

Krystal got a variety of dishes piled up high. Looked like enough food for a family of 6. That's how hungry Krystal was. So it didn't take long before digging in. She ripped into the steaks like she was a t-rex. Then gobbled down some rice. Then eaten more and more food. After a while....
1311.title: An all-you-can-eat buffet.

choices: RUMBLE!!!! She was extremely hungry for some reason.
Her clothes were tighter then they were before. She had gained weight overnight!
She was being watched by someone.
She could hear strange chanting in the distane
14.content: It was a regular day at the temple for Tigress. She trained, sparred with the other members of the Five, and fasted through her evening meditations. She purred at the thought of getting to see Po the next days as she climbed into her bed. He was lazy, undsiciplined, and still quite tubby, but she still liked the panda despite those flaws. As she drifted off to sleep, she thought she heard chimes ringing. When she wakes up the next morning Tigress finds her self sleeping in a bed of leaves and moss. Startled, she jumps to her feet and begins scanning the area with her eyes and nose. "POOOO!!!!!" She roars. After getting no response and finding nothing in her search but an endless forest teeming with fruits and strangely obese prey animals. Tigress settles down to plan her next move. It was then she realized that......
14.title: Master Tigress, the formerly trim.

choices: Fruit! The animals are too fatty.
Meat! The fruit isn't gonna be enough.
A combination of both! She's too hungry to resist either.
141.content: Tigress will massage her stomach as it rumbles again even louder. A little worried that she was so hungry, Tigress did some more searching. Again, only morbidly obese prey or odd fruit. "Meat or Fruit?" She mutters to herself as another rumble roars from her belly.
141.title: RUMBLE!!!! She was extremely hungry for some re...

choices: Guuurrrgllle! Too full! Save the rest.
Take a rest, then eat some more.
1412.content: "Oh, forget it!" She growls as she launches herself at the nearest animal, The blobby deer was so fat, it barely had to time to snort it's fear before Tigress lands on it, her feet sinking into it blubbery body. It crashes to the floor as she rips it's throat out. She starts devouring the animal and before long, she eats almost a quarter of the animal before stopping for air. "How could I have eaten so much?" She asks herself.
1412.title: Meat! The fruit isn't gonna be enough.

choices: Search for more food and slimes
14121.content: RUUMMMMMMBBBBBLLLLLLE! Tigress was amazed of how starved she really was after eaten almost a quarter of the blubbery deer she ate. So she continued to devour the fat filling deer, until there was nothing left to eat off it. "Pheew" having her fill she begins to realize how large she's become her belly extending over her pants,her butt has little more cushion to it,her breasts grew larger to the point her shit tighten around them. She examines her new soft, plush body and takes a liking to it. "So this what it must feel like to be Po" she said to herself. She than began to feel a little thirsty after her meal digested. After walking trying to find a source of water Tigress sat down exhausted she took a nap, she began to wake up after something cold and slimy runs through her fur she woke up to the sight of a blue slime the size of a person. Before Tigress had time to react the blue slime target her mouth and began filling her up like a balloon. After some time Tigress eventual swallowed the slime and was no longer thirsty. Her belly began to move as the slime adjust to its new home which Tigress liked as she felt up her bobby body.
14121.title: Rummmbbbllle! Still starving!

141212.content: As she tries to waddle hom her stomach rumbles again loudly
141212.title: Try to get back home

info.brief_description: Amaterasu, Krystal, Nala, and Tigress adventure and gain weight as anthros in a fat world.
info.description:
Welcome to Obesia, a land of fat furs, that is about to gain (at least) four new members: Amaterasu of Okami, Tigress of Kung Fu Panda, Nala of the Lion King, and Krystal of Star Fox.

Come with us, and let us watch them gain weight and have great adventures.
